game_description: Story: In the Far in the distant future. Mankind decides to dispatch an Outer Space Diplomat prior to expanding into the outer solar system. Prior to this, special training is conducted in the former Jupiter region. For now, aim for the portal. Trial version: This is a trial version. This is a demo version, but the recorded aspects are new works that are not included in the main version. It can also be enjoyed by those who already have the full version of the game. Full version: This is a trial version of the full version. https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5275940062439283
review_1: I really love the vertigo sensation, the feeling that you're outer space and exploring... please add more levels and enhance graphics!! Really enjoyable experience. Cheers!
review_2: For me, the biggest advantage of VR is to be able to visit "impossible places". Things like the game ico: immense landscapes that are misterious but not threatening. This little gem is exactly that. There's not much to do other than trasverse the surreal landscape (many ways to go about it) and marvel at the sublime vistas. I wanted to buy the full version but the process did not work out, something might be broken. To the developer: thank you very much. This is something special
